channel.title: CVE Feed for Vova Anokhin -- Shortcodes Ultimate
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Vova Anokhin -- Shortcodes Ultimate

item.title: CVE-2023-25050|2024-08-02T11:11:43.847Z -- vova%20anokhin -- shortcodes%20ultimate
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Vova Anokhin Shortcodes Ultimate allows Absolute Path Traversal.This issue affects Shortcodes Ultimate: from n/a through 5.12.6.

item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Vova Anokhin Shortcodes Ultimate allows Absolute Path Traversal.This issue affects Shortcodes Ultimate: from n/a through 5.12.6.
